snippet: The animal rights group PETA has enlisted a few celebrities in its campaign to have Mali, a 38-year-old Indian elephant, transferred from the Manila Zoo to a sanctuary in Thailand.
abstract: Animal rights group PETA has enlisted celebrities in campaign to free Mali, 38-year old Indian elephant kept at a zoo in Manila, Philippines; PETA representatives say Mali is unhappy and kept in poor conditions, facts disputed by her zookeepers, who fear that a transfer to a sanctuary would harm the aged elephant.
lead_paragraph: The animal rights group PETA has enlisted a few celebrities in its campaign to have Mali, a 38-year-old Indian elephant, transferred from the Manila Zoo to a sanctuary in Thailand.

headline.main: A Very Big Issue at Manila’s Zoo
headline.print_headline: Philippine Zoo’s Star Is Now Animal Rights Cause

keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
keywords.name: organizations
